T02TD2822E:171a-0: @171a * // 'phags pa thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2822E:171a-1: ma lus nad rnams kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD2822E:171b-0: chags sdang gti mug phrag dog @171b dang //
T02TD2822E:171b-1: ser sna'i dug 'joms spyan ras gzigs //
T02TD2822E:171b-3: nad med nad kyis 'jigs pa dang //
T02TD2822E:171b-4: nad bcas sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba //
T02TD2822E:171b-6: sbyor bas 'jigs pa bskyab par bya //
T02TD2822E:171b-7: rin chen sbyangs pa'i snod dag par //
T02TD2822E:171b-8: nam mkha'i chu yis gang byas pa //
T02TD2822E:171b-9: bde gshegs ring bsrel snying po can //
T02TD2822E:171b-10: mdun gzhag yid kyis dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD2822E:171b-11: de la dkyil 'khor rnam gsum ste //
T02TD2822E:171b-12: ma dag dag par byed pa ni //
T02TD2822E:171b-13: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD2822E:171b-14: nad 'joms mgon po dkar mdzes so //
T02TD2822E:171b-15: de ni mtshan mo zla shar dus //
T02TD2822E:171b-16: shel mdog hr'i: yig las skyes pa //
T02TD2822E:171b-17: bdud rtsi bum pa dkar bsnams shing //
T02TD2822E:171b-18: phyag stong bcu gcig zhal mnga' ba'o //
T02TD2822E:171b-19: dag pa dri med 'khor lo la //
T02TD2822E:171b-20: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //
T02TD2822E:171b-21: nad sel mgon po dmar mdzes te //
T02TD2822E:171b-22: nyin mo rta bdun 'char tshe yin //
T02TD2822E:171b-23: dri med phyir mi ldog pa yi //
T02TD2822E:171b-24: 'khor lo de ni phyed gsum dus //
T02TD2822E:171b-25: sna tshogs padmo la gnas pa //
T02TD2822E:171b-26: nad bral mgon po aindra'i mdog / bud med byis pa bde ster te //
T02TD2822E:171b-27: zla tshes zla rgyas nad 'jig dus //
T02TD2822E:171b-28: nyi shar nyi zer nad med pa //
T02TD2822E:171b-29: de bzhin phyed gsum nad spangs so //
T02TD2822E:171b-30: de phyir mkhas pa nad med lus //
T02TD2822E:171b-32: ston mo nye ba'i ston mo dang //
T02TD2822E:171b-33: dga' ston chen po sbyin par bya //
T02TD2822E:171b-34: gang yang rnal 'byor lus sbyin gyi //
T02TD2822E:171b-35: gtor ma rgya chen bya ba dang //
T02TD2822E:171b-36: mi 'jigs sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i //
T02TD2822E:171b-37: mchod pa rim bzhin brtsam par bya //
T02TD2822E:171b-38: spyan ras gzigs kyis nad bsal ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
